Recipes.RecipeDescription: The basic staple of American cuisine: the cheeseburger! A simple recipe that you can make your own.
Recipes.RecipeIngredients: Ground Beef, Canola Oil, American Cheese, Brioche Buns, Tomatoes, Lettuce, Onions, Salt and Pepper, and Condiments of your choice!

Recipes.RecipeDescription: The classic Thai dish that everyone loves! This recipe combines fresh ingredients with an amazing sauce.

Recipes.RecipeDescription: The yummiest pasta dish you will ever experience! It is a classic red meat sauce that everyone loves.
Recipes.RecipeIngredients: Onion, Celery, Carrot, Beef Chuck, Tomato Paste, Chicken Stock, Whole Milk, Noodle of choice

Recipes.RecipeDescription: This popular curry dish will make you drool! It is spicy and tangy in all the right places.
Recipes.RecipeIngredients: Chicken, Onion, Serrano Peppers, Tomato Paste, White Vinegar, Garlic, Ginger, Red Chili Flakes, Paprika, Coriander, Turmeric, Mustard Powder, Cumin, Rice

Recipes.RecipeDescription: The best salad, ever! It is classic and easy to whip up on a nice summer day.
Recipes.RecipeIngredients: Romaine Lettuce, Parmesan, Croutons, Olive Oil, Caesar Salad Dressing

Recipes.RecipeDescription: The best dumpling out of all the dumplings! You can eat this on any day, anywhere.
